module.name: Tír Tairngire
module.story: Allan, please add story Tír Tairngire

module.name: Arcology Living
module.story: He spendt his early years in an Arcology owned by $MEGA . His parrents where buissy workers and little $REAL spendt most of his time entertaining himself with a comlink or playing with the other kids

module.name: High School
module.story: In the $SEASON of 2065 the dreaded happened. $REAL began his life at high school

module.name: Magical Education (Archtype)
module.story: As $REAL came of age he started showing magic tendicies and $MEGA took care of him, giving him the best possible education they could. On the implied contract that he would work for them
